summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of L.I.D. No. 6681 for the improvement of 58th Ave. S.W. from approximately 160 feet North of S.W. Andover Street to approximately 290 feet south of S.W. Orleans St.; and certain other streets, avenue and easements; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; and conducting preliminary right of way activities; under Ord. No. 105925, and levy and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a local improvement fund.
